setup_script_description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded
task: navigate from expanded disclosure button to link in dropdown
specific_user_instruction: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the navigation region, move into the button's associated list of links. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information about the dropdown and link.
output_assertions: Role of the dropdown ('list') is conveyed
Number of items in the dropdown (4) is conveyed
Role of the first item in the dropdown ('link') is conveyed
Name of the first item in the dropdown ('Overview') is conveyed
